description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Wyv and Keep is a co-operative platform adventure in which up to two players control a pair of intrepid treasure hunters on a quest to retrieve the legendary and valuable Lost Idol of Quetzecola. Along the way they will need to co-operate in to solve brain-twisting puzzles, and hopefully make it out with the legendary treasure before the bickering of the heroes - or players - undoes them!
